text.div:
Mapping from (not specified) to (not specified)

DRAFT. Published on 2021-09-22 by VCI (VCI: https://vci.org). Creative Commons 0

A Mapping between CVX and AIR Codes for Covid vaccinations. This mapping is bi-directional - one group for each direction


Group 1Mapping from https://www.humanservices.gov.au/organisations/health-professionals/enablers/air-vaccine-code-formats|20210222 to PH_VaccinesAdministeredCVX_CDC_NIP

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
COVAST (COVID-19 Vaccine AstraZeneca)is equivalent to210 (COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL)
COMIRN (Pfizer Comirnaty)is equivalent to208 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 30 mcg/0.3 mL dose)
MODERN (Moderna Spikevax)is equivalent to207 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 100 mcg or 50 mcg dose)

Group 2Mapping from PH_VaccinesAdministeredCVX_CDC_NIP to https://www.humanservices.gov.au/organisations/health-professionals/enablers/air-vaccine-code-formats|20210222

Source CodeRelationshipTarget Code
210 (COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-ChAdOx1, PF, 0.5 mL)is equivalent toCOVAST (COVID-19 Vaccine AstraZeneca)
208 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 30 mcg/0.3 mL dose)is equivalent toCOMIRN (Pfizer Comirnaty)
207 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 100 mcg or 50 mcg dose)is equivalent toMODERN (Moderna Spikevax)
211 (COVID-19 vaccine, Subunit, rS-nanoparticle+Matrix-M1 Adjuvant, PF, 0.5 mL)(not mapped)
212 (COVID-19 vaccine, vector-nr, rS-Ad26, PF, 0.5 mL)(not mapped)
213 (SARS-COV-2 (COVID-19) vaccine, UNSPECIFIED)(not mapped)
217 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 30 mcg/0.3 mL dose, tris-sucrose)(not mapped)
218 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 10 mcg/0.2 mL dose, tris-sucrose)(not mapped)
219 (COVID-19, mRNA, LNP-S, PF, 3 mcg/0.2 mL dose, tris-sucrose)(not mapped)
500 (COVID-19 Non-US Vaccine, Product Unknown)(not mapped)
501 (COVID-19 IV Non-US Vaccine (QAZCOVID-IN))(not mapped)
502 (COVID-19 IV Non-US Vaccine (COVAXIN))(not mapped)
503 (COVID-19 LAV Non-US Vaccine (COVIVAC))(not mapped)
504 (COVID-19 VVnr Non-US Vaccine (Sputnik Light))(not mapped)
505 (COVID-19 VVnr Non-US Vaccine (Sputnik V))(not mapped)
506 (COVID-19 VVnr Non-US Vaccine (CanSino Biological Inc./Beijing Institute of Biotechnology))(not mapped)
507 (COVID-19 PS Non-US Vaccine (Anhui Zhifei Longcom Biopharm + Inst of Micro, Chinese Acad of Sciences))(not mapped)
508 (COVID-19 PS Non-US Vaccine (Jiangsu Province Centers for Disease Control and Prevention))(not mapped)
509 (COVID-19 PS Non-US Vaccine (EpiVacCorona))(not mapped)
510 (COVID-19 IV Non-US Vaccine (BIBP, Sinopharm))(not mapped)
511 (COVID-19 IV Non-US Vaccine (CoronaVac, Sinovac))(not mapped)
